abstract: German press assails Belgian press repts of Helgoland battle
snippet: BERLIN Jan. 2 (UP)--The Voelkischer Beobachter, official organ of the Nazi party, today renewed the attack on the Belgian press that caused wide attention a few weeks ago and caused Allied speculation that Germany might invade Belgium and Holland....

headline.main: REICH RENEWS ATTACK ON PRESS OF BELGIUM; Report of Helgoland Battle Is Declared to Be Pro-Ally

lead_paragraph: BERLIN Jan. 2 (UP)--The Voelkischer Beobachter, official organ of the Nazi party, today renewed the attack on the Belgian press that caused wide attention a few weeks ago and caused Allied speculation that Germany might invade Belgium and Holland.
